subject: Psychology
title: Keystone Habits
description: A quick win: understand Keystone Habits.

hook.text: When people start exercising, they also start eating better and sleeping more. One habit changed everything.

buildup.text: Keystone habits are single habits that trigger a cascade of positive changes in other areas of life.

discovery.text: Duhigg found that exercise, making your bed, and family meals are common keystone habits that ripple outward.

twist.text: Keystone habits work by creating small wins. Success in one area builds confidence and momentum for others.

climax.text: You don't need to change everything at once. Find the one habit that moves the others and start there.

punchline.text: One right habit can rearrange your entire life.

quiz.question: What makes a keystone habit special?
options: It triggers positive changes in multiple other areas
It is the hardest habit to build
It only affects one narrow behavior
